publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 12
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa ol śegiź ipli qyǯaḥ üśt́uńa miźmoru David́niń. Jarlyɣašlaɣyn ḿeni e H ki t́uǵańdi ḥasid́ kiši ki eksiĺdiĺar inamlylar adam ulanlaryndan.
Jalɣanny śoźlejdirĺar kiši dostuna jylma śoźĺar ič́ĺarińd́a tijḿa t́uśĺu śoźĺar śoźlejdirĺar.
Eksit́kej H bar jylma śoźč́uĺarni tiĺni śoźlejdoɣonlarny ullu śoźĺar.
Ki ajtadyrlar tilimiź była ḱučajirbiź śoźu erinĺamiźniń birǵamiźǵa kim bij bolur biźǵa.
Talavyndan miśkińĺarniń ynčḥyrmaɣyndan jarlylarnyn haĺegińa turarmyn ajtty H qojarmyn jarlyɣaš tuzaḥ qojɣany üč́uń anar.
Ajtmaḥlary H-nyn aruv ajtmaḥlar ḱuḿuš́ kibik syzɣyrylɣan śoźu Bijniń jerniń syzɣy rylɣan jedi qat.
Śeń e H saqlaɣyn alarny abraɣyn any ol dordan bu dunjaɣa dejiń.
Č́uv́ŕa rašaʿlar üŕujd́urĺar ḱot́uŕuĺǵańd́a rašaʿlar ḥorluḥtur adam ulanlaryna.
